attributes.action: present me and a selected group of people with an Eagle Owl of their very own.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would really like an eagle owl. So would a number of people I know. Gordon, if you could give us the birds of prey we truly desire, you would rise yet further in my estimation. And who could fail to vote Labour with the reasurring weight of a friendly owl on their shoulder?

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
